snippet: Lapointe will have his No. 5 jersey retired by the team Saturday night. Lapointe’s will be the 18th Canadiens jersey to be retired.
lead_paragraph: Lapointe will have his No. 5 jersey retired by the team Saturday night. Lapointe’s will be the 18th Canadiens jersey to be retired.

headline.main: Canadiens Set to Retire Guy Lapointe’s No. 5
headline.print_headline: Canadiens set to retire Guy Lapointe's No. 5
